alert.note: Alert for Lac qui Parle; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 4:25AM CDT until May 12 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lac qui Parle County in west central Minnesota... West central Yellow Medicine County in west central Minnesota... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 424 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moritz, or 6 miles northeast of Clear Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Marietta around 440 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Madison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
